metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12497 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 7.0.x through7.0.8, Community Edition 6.0.x through 6.0.19, and Community Edition 5.0.xthrough 5.0.36. In the customer or external frontend, personal informationof agents (e.g., Name and mail address) can be disclosed in external notes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12497` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.19-1
otrs2 - 6.0.19-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.19-1').
